Articles.Content: I played on pc and loved not needing fuel just so I can go out and build. I am now playing on XBOX one and can't find the cheat menu is it not in the game or if it is ,where is it please and thank you.

It was discussed previously, but no, there isn't a patch yet where you can activate it.

 

But keep an eye out on the forum 'Gameplay and Technical Support -> Technical Support (Playstation 4, Xbox One)' for updates.

It's requested a lot, so I think it will be there soon.
